meanings.definition: The process of coming into view or becoming exposed after being concealed.
meanings.sent1: The emergences of the flowers in spring bring joy to all.
meanings.sent2: The emergences of new stars in the night sky are always a fascinating sight.
meanings.sent3: The emergences of unexpected guests at the party surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The emergences of ideas in her mind were like fireworks lighting up the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The emergences of the sun over the horizon painted the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The act of coming into existence or becoming known.
meanings.sent1: The emergences of new technologies have changed our lives.
meanings.sent2: The emergences of talented artists often go unnoticed at first.
meanings.sent3: The emergences of rumors about the teacher's pet hamster made the class giggle.
meanings.sent4: The emergences of opportunities in life should be embraced with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The emergences of a butterfly from its chrysalis symbolize transformation and beauty.
